ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable day night vision audio video CMOS security camera. Easy installation and play
36 IR illuminators for night vision. Built-in light sensor controls IR activation. Minimum illumination: 0.0 Lux (IR LED on)
Horizontal Resolution: 520 TV Lines. 6.0mm Camera Lens. Built-in microphone and audio circuit
Metal body housing, bracket and sun shade for indoor outdoor applications. Can be mounted on the wall or ceiling
Package included: 4 x CMOS bullet cameras and 4 x security warning stickers. Power requires: 12V DC 500mA or above (sold separately)
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Pack Home Outdoor Infrared Bullet Surveillance Security Cameras Built-in Audio Microphone IR-Cut Filter Day Night Vision 520TVL for DVR CCTV System with Bonus Warning Decals AC8
